config.mod-enable.tooltip: Controls if the mod is enabled
config.grow-chance.tooltip: Chance to grow a flower in a patch of grass
config.HarvestByScythe.tooltip: If enabled the flowers will need to be harvested by scythe, otherwise they will be harvested by hand
config.PreserveFlowersOnProbability0.too: If this option is enabled flowers that were present will not get deleted even if the new configuration drops the probaility to 0. Disable to remove those flowers
config.FlowerPage.tooltip: Advanced options to choose the probability of each seed that can spawn a flower
config.FlowerPage.description:
This page allows you to configure how likely each seed will grow.
A disabled seed will not produce flowers
config.AllLocations.Tooltip: If this option is enabled flower will try to appear on all the game locations that have grass instead of the default Farms and Greenhouse locations
config.KeepRegrowFlower.Tooltip: If this option is enabled, flowers that bloom multiple times will not be removed on harvest
config.PresetPage.tooltip: Generate a custom probabilities fror your flowers with in an easier way
config.PresetPage.explanation:
This allows you to create a custom probabilities for your flowers. 
Note: This will overwrite the current configuration if you save the changes.
Instructions:
1. Enable to regeneration (Safety check)
2. Select if you want to customize the vanilla vs Modded flowers behavior
3. Choose the generation algorithm
4. Save and close the config. (If you only save, it will try to apply again)
config.PresetPage.Regenerate.tooltip: Safety check. Unless this option is selected no regeneration will be done
config.PresetPage.ModdedVanillaEntitleme: If you want to favor vanilla or modded flowers
Only vanilla flowers. Disable modded flowers
Prefer vanilla flowers. Have less modded flowers
Normal. Have both in equal measures
Prefer modded flowers. Have less vanilla flowers
Only modded flowers. Disable vanilla flowers
config.PresetPage.AlgorithmEntitlement.t: What preset (algorithm) to use to generate the flower probability
config.PresetPage.AlgorithmEntitlement.v: Equality: All flowers have the same probability
Price: The more expensive the flower, the lower the probability
Random: Each flower will have a random probability
config.PresetPage.RespectDisabled.toolti: If enabled the flowers that are currently disabled will continue to be disabled, regarless of the mod config. Useful if you have a particular flower disabled
